<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>If awa_service_channel.workitem_table=interaction, set the type to others. Except for the OOB chat service channel, which should be set to "chat"</description>
        <name>Set awa_service_channel.type</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// set OOB chat service channel's type
var chatServiceChannelGr = new GlideRecord("awa_service_channel");
if (chatServiceChannelGr.get("27f675e3739713004a905ee515f6a7c3")) {
    chatServiceChannelGr.setValue("type", "chat");
    chatServiceChannelGr.setWorkflow(false);
    chatServiceChannelGr.update();
}

// set other service channel where workitem_table=interaction and the type hasn't been set, to "other"
var interactionServiceChannelGr = new GlideMultipleUpdate("awa_service_channel");
interactionServiceChannelGr.addNullQuery("type");
interactionServiceChannelGr.addQuery("workitem_table", "interaction");
interactionServiceChannelGr.setValue("type", "other");
interactionServiceChannelGr.execute();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
